desc: Scottish CND merchandise to support the campaign. SCND t-shirts, badges, flags and more. All profits go towards the campaign. Bairns Not Bombs, Indy Ref 2, Scrap Trident etc.

layout.text: We work for the abolition of all nuclear weapons in Britain as a step toward the global elimination of these weapons of mass destruction. All profits from our sales go to fund our work campaigning for peace.
